2025-07-18T21:05:00.CONTENT_EN:
Transport Department has received notification from MTR Corporation Limited that as informed by the Mainland Railway Authorities, the destination of High Speed Rail train G6048 /G6047 on 20 July 2025 travelling between Hong Kong West Kowloon Station and Zhanjiangxi Station will change to Guangzhounan Station due to adverse weather conditions. 

Trains affected:
G6048 (will arrive at Guangzhounan Station)
G6047 (will depart from Guangzhounan Station)

For the latest train schedules, please refer to the 12306 official website (12306. cn). You may also check latest train information from the HSR website, mobile app or see the information provided at Hong Kong West Kowloon Station.
2025-07-18T21:05:00.CONTENT_CN:
運輸署接獲港鐵公司通知，內地鐵路單位通報，由於天氣情況惡劣，2025年07月20日原定來往香港西九龍站及湛江西站的高速鐵路列車車次G6048 /G6047，更改為來往香港西九龍站至廣州南站。

受影響車次:
G6048 (終到站更改為廣州南站)
G6047 (始發站更改為廣州南站)

有關車次的資料，請留意12306官方網站(12306.cn)，如已安裝手機應用程式，可按「車站大屏」頁面。您亦可留意於高速鐵路網頁、手機應用程式或香港西九龍站發放的最新資訊。

2025-07-18T22:50:00.CONTENT_EN: Due to malfunction of traffic lights at the junction of Connaught Road West and Western Fire Services Street, motorists are advised to drive with utmost care when passing through the road junctions, pay extra attention to the traffic signs and safety of pedestrians. Pedestrians please pay attention to vehicles when crossing junctions with malfunctioned traffic lights.
2025-07-18T22:50:00.CONTENT_CN: 由於干諾道西和西消防街交界路口的交通燈失靈，駕駛人士在駛經有關路口時，請加倍小心，注意交通標誌的指示並留意過路行人的安全。行人在交通燈失靈的路口橫過馬路時，請特別注意車輛。

2025-07-19T01:05:00.CONTENT_EN: The traffic lights at the junction of Connaught Road West and Western Fire Services Street have resumed normal services.
2025-07-19T01:05:00.CONTENT_CN: 位於干諾道西和西消防街交界路口的交通燈已恢復正常運作。

description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_EN: Hong Kong West Kowloon Station Public Car Park Now Full
description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_CN: 香港西九龍站公眾停車場現已泊滿

2025-07-19T11:50:00.CONTENT_EN: Transport Department has received notification from MTR Corporation Limited that Hong Kong West Kowloon Station Public Car Park is now full. Please use public transport to reach the station.
2025-07-19T11:50:00.CONTENT_CN: 運輸署接獲港鐵公司通知， 香港西九龍站公眾停車場現已泊滿。請使用公共交通工具前往。

2025-07-19T14:20:00.CONTENT_EN: Due to hoisting of Strong Wind Signal No. 3 and the associated wet weather, Transport Department appeals motorists and the commuters to: i. pay attention to the special traffic and transport arrangements may be implemented; ii. pay attention to the possible traffic congestions of the roads; iii. plan the journey in advance; iv. allow more traveling time to cater for delay; v. drive with extra care and patience; and vi. take heed of traffic situation particularly at busy junctions with obstructive views.
2025-07-19T14:20:00.CONTENT_CN: 由於三號強風信號現正生效、天雨路滑，運輸署呼籲駕駛人士及乘客須: i.留意當局可能會實施特別的交通及運輸措施； ii.留意在個別道路可能會出現交通擠塞的情況； iii.提早計劃行程路線； iv.預留充裕時間出門； v.小心駕駛及保持忍讓；及 vi.特别留意視線受阻的交通繁忙路口。

2025-07-20T00:20:00.CONTENT_EN: Due to hoisting of No. 8 Northeast Gale or Storm Signal and the associated wet weather, Transport Department appeals motorists and the commuters to: i. pay attention to the special traffic and transport arrangements may be implemented; ii. pay attention to the possible traffic congestions of the roads; iii. plan the journey in advance; iv. allow more traveling time to cater for delay; v. drive with extra care and patience; and vi. take heed of traffic situation particularly at busy junctions with obstructive views.
2025-07-20T00:20:00.CONTENT_CN: 由於八號東北烈風或暴風信號現正生效、天雨路滑，運輸署呼籲駕駛人士及乘客須: i.留意當局可能會實施特別的交通及運輸措施； ii.留意在個別道路可能會出現交通擠塞的情況； iii.提早計劃行程路線； iv.預留充裕時間出門； v.小心駕駛及保持忍讓；及 vi.特别留意視線受阻的交通繁忙路口。

2025-07-19T18:52:00.CONTENT_EN: As informed by the Mainland Railway Authorities, some High Speed Rail train services on 20 July 2025 traveling between Hong Kong West Kowloon Station and Mainland have been cancelled or had their departing station and destination changed due to adverse weather conditions. Cancelled train service: To Guangzhounan Station: G6582 / G6584 To Shenzhenbei Station: G5636 / G5638/ G5640 / G5642 From Guangzhounan Station: G6581 / G6583 From Shenzhenbei Station: G5637 / G5639 / G5641 / G5643 Departing Station/Destination Changed: G6048 (Arrive at Guangzhounan Station) G6047 (Departure from Guangzhounan Station) For the latest train schedules, please refer to the 12306 official website (12306. cn/en/) or the mobile app. You may also check latest train information from the HSR website, mobile app or see the information provided at Hong Kong West Kowloon Station. You may also consider taking the East Rail Line to Lo Wu/ Lok Ma Chau or using other transport to enter the Mainland. For ticket refunds, please refer to the High Speed Rail website and process within the time stated. Please use the 12306 official website (12306. cn/en/) or mobile app and avoid coming to Hong Kong West Kowloon Station.
2025-07-19T18:52:00.CONTENT_CN: 內地鐵路單位通報，由於天氣情況惡劣，2025年07月20日部分來往香港西九龍站及內地的高速鐵路列車車次取消或需要更改始發站及終到站。 已取消的車次: 前往廣州南站:G6582 /G6584 前往深圳北站:G5636 /G5638 /G5640 /G5642 由廣州南站出發:G6581 /G6583 由深圳北站出發:G5637 /G5639 /G5641 /G5643 更改始發站及終到站的車次: G6048 (終到站更改為廣州南站) G6047 (始發站更改為廣州南站) 有關車次的資料，請留意12306官方網站(12306.cn)，如已安裝手機應用程式，可按「車站大屏」頁面。您亦可留意於高速鐵路網頁、手機應用程式或香港西九龍站發放的最新資訊。 您可考慮乘搭東鐵綫經羅湖/落馬洲，或使用其他跨境交通工具前往內地。 如需退票，請參閱高速鐵路網頁並於指定日期內辦理。請盡量使用12306官方網站(12306.cn)或手機應用程式，不用急於到香港西九龍站辦理。

2025-07-19T21:12:00.CONTENT_EN:

description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_EN: Lok Ma Chau – Huanggang Cross-boundaryShuttle Bus
description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_CN: 落馬洲 – 皇崗穿梭巴士

2025-07-19T21:29:00.CONTENT_EN:
Due to Tropical Cyclone, the service of cross-boundary coach will be adjusted as follows:

Lok Ma Chau – Huanggang Cross-boundary Shuttle Bus
Will continue to provide normal service for at least two hours after the signal is hoisted, with enhanced frequency if necessary. Afterward, the Shuttle Bus service will operate at 30-minute intervals. Service adjustments may be made depending on weather or road conditions. Passengers are advised to stay updated by following our latest announcements.
2025-07-19T21:29:00.CONTENT_CN:
因受熱帶氣旋影響，跨境巴士服務安排如下：

落馬洲-皇崗過境穿梭巴士
維持正常服務至八號信號生效後最少兩小時，並在有需要時加密班次，其後班次會調整至每三十分鐘一班。若因應天氣或路面狀況，服務有需要進一步調整，會適時公布。

2025-07-20T00:02:00.CONTENT_EN: Due to Tropical Cyclone, the service of cross-boundary coach will be adjusted as follows: -The service of Hong Kong-Zhuhai-Macao Bridge Shuttle Bus will be suspended at 1 am. -Lok Ma Chau – Huanggang Cross-boundary Shuttle Bus will remain limited services. -Short-haul Cross-boundary Coach Service Mong Kok Route (Northbound): Last departure operated at 2:00 am Mong Kok Route (Southbound): Last departure operated at 2:00 am Wan Chai Route (Northbound): Last departure operated at 2:00 am Wan Chai Route (Southbound): Last departure operated at 2:00 am Yau Tsim Route (Northbound): Last departure operated at 12:20 am Yau Tsim Route (Southbound): Last departure operated at 12:20 am Kwun Tong Route (Northbound): Last departure operated at 12:20 am Kwun Tong Route (Southbound): Last departure operated at 12:20 am Tsuen Wan Route (Northbound): Last departure operated at 2:00 am Tsuen Wan Route (Southbound): Last departure operated at 2:00 am
2025-07-20T00:02:00.CONTENT_CN: 因受熱帶氣旋影響，跨境巴士服務安排如下： -港珠澳大橋穿梭巴士會在上午1時暫停服務 -落馬洲-皇崗過境穿梭巴士服務會維持有限度服務。 -短途跨境巴士服務 旺角線(北行)：尾班車上午2時00分開出 旺角線(南行)：尾班車上午2時00分開出 灣仔線(北行)：尾班車上午2時00分開出 灣仔線(南行)：尾班車上午2時00分開出 油尖線(北行)：尾班車上午12時20分開出 油尖線(南行)：尾班車上午12時20分開出 觀塘線(北行)：尾班車上午12時20分開出 觀塘線(南行)：尾班車上午12時20分開出 荃灣線(北行)：尾班車上午2時00分開出 荃灣線(南行)：尾班車上午2時00分開出

2025-07-19T23:15:00.CONTENT_EN: Due to high wind , the following arrangements will be implemented on cycle track and footpath of Cross Bay Bridge at Tseung Kwan O: Members of the public heading for Cross Bay Bridge are advised that the cycle track and footpath of the Cross Bay Bridge are going to be closed soon due to high wind. Please use alternative route for travelling to LOHAS Park and Tiu Keng Leng.
2025-07-19T23:15:00.CONTENT_CN: 因強風，將軍澳跨灣大橋單車徑及行人路將實施下列安排: 前往跨灣大橋人士請注意，因強風，跨灣大橋單車徑及行人路即將封閉。請改用其他單車徑及行人路前往日出康城及調景嶺。

2025-07-20T00:25:00.CONTENT_EN: Due to high wind , the following arrangements have been implemented on cycle track and footpath of Cross Bay Bridge at Tseung Kwan O: Members of the public heading for Cross Bay Bridge are advised that the cycle track and footpath of the Cross Bay Bridge have been closed due to high wind. Please use alternative route for travelling to LOHAS Park and Tiu Keng Leng.
2025-07-20T00:25:00.CONTENT_CN: 因強風，將軍澳跨灣大橋單車徑及行人路現已實施下列安排: 前往跨灣大橋人士請注意，因強風，跨灣大橋單車徑及行人路已經封閉。請改用其他單車徑及行人路前往日出康城及調景嶺。
